pageProps.title: 8 Symptoms of Parasites in Human Body
pageProps.metaDesc:
So today we'll talk about the warning signs that can help you detect parasites in your body. But I have some bad news to share with you. Regardless of what you're doing to improve your health, you probably have parasites in your body right now. They're just not causing any issues.
What exactly is a parasite?

A parasite can be a virus, worm, bacteria, or fungus that has a unique relationship with your body. It is not a friendly bacteria or microbe.

It basically steals things from you and causes problems for you, but there are no benefits in return. As a result, that relationship is more pathogenic. Of course, there are people who are parasitic.
